entry.title: A Meaningful Day
entry.content: It was a fine day on Aug.26, 2017. The little hippo got an important present with meaningful significance from the bird. She felt so happy and moved. Maybe you canâ€™t help being curious to know what the present is. Itâ€™s a ring and a watch. Whatâ€™s more, he got down on one knee proposing marriage. It was romantic though it was not in public place because the bird doesnâ€™t like proposing in public place. Do you want to see the photos? Here they are:
